title: Looking for Nap Lajoie Batting Sweet Caporal 350 factory 25

posts.post_title: Looking for Nap Lajoie Batting Sweet Caporal 350 factory 25
posts.post_content: Anyone have a copy of this card for sale or trade?  I've got trade bait - or can pay cash.  Please check your collection and let me know if you've got one!
